subject: DATE:          20th November
body:
DATE:          20th November, 2023
 
Dear Sir,
 
It is glaring that all our efforts in making you take value for your money for the past one year haven’t met you at any convenient bend simply because you have continually aligned our mails and efforts to those buckets of fools masquerading to be of consequence having been impersonating known and established authorities.
 
it remained a considered view of this Commission to reach out to you directly once more before this fund is retired to the treasury by the Auditors assuming it to have been abandoned or unclaimed by you much as we shall not fail to thank you in advance for your Chivalrous gesture in dashing this out as it goes back to the society to contribute or fund part of our corporate social responsibilities.
 
We seek your support and honest counsel by giving meaningful reasoning to this mail.
 
Be advised.
 
GORDON RICHARD
European Credit Commission

subject: Re:   DATE:          20th November
body:
Dear Gordon Richard,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must admit, your email is quite intriguing. I apologize if my previous lack of response has caused any inconvenience. I would appreciate it if you could provide me with more information about the purpose and details of this fund that you mentioned. Could you kindly explain what the European Credit Commission does and how this fund is related to it? Additionally, I would like to know more about the corporate social responsibility initiatives that your organization supports.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: We urge you to aggregate your potential.
body:
DATE:   10th February, 2024

Dear Mary,

Gracious for your diligence with appreciation. We have digested your
response with serious understanding and restate that we are reminding you
of your unresolved fund of US$ 24.1M including accrued interest in view of
the consent granted for its payout long ago but for your inability to
observe due process probably as a result of attention diversion by people
who claimed what they are not resulting to its continuous float on our
voucher as unpaid for the past 3 years. Our role is purely on supervisory
ensuring complete syndication compliance to allotted payouts by the Audit
Board to its owners.



In the light of the above premise, we implore you to proactively take
advantage of the emerging dispensation in taking value for your money as
all government taxes are deducted at source in line with international best
practices leaving the fund owner with the personal cost only. We shall
continue to deploy the option that involves the least expenditure to
achieve maximum gain in view that payment of this magnitude can never be
syndicated without minor expense which we do not shoulder.



Having received and responded on this and for the purpose of clarity, we
shall ask you to avail us your details i.e. your receiving bank
coordinates, your address, direct phone and any means of your
identification in other that we confirm of being in contact with the fit
and proper beneficiary whom we intended communicating.



We are asking for your receiving bank coordinates not for any other reason
but to process your remittance. The records must show clearly where this
fund originated, which is the European Central Bank, Frankfurt, Germany
under the consent of the European Credit Commission to its designated
account being your bank.



Please do not feel this to be rigid rather due process as we must ascertain
the veracity of your details in our database before we abreast you on what
next.



We urge you to aggregate your potential in giving this effectual completion
in view that money is next important to man after life thus while dealing
on it, adequate care must be taken to run away from apportioning of blames
and regrets.

Receive our assurances that your views will be accorded the highest degree
of confidentiality as it is of time we give reason to this payment enabling
you that you take value for your money.



Finally, this year's CSR being our impact on the society is focusing on
victims of landslides globally.

We look forward to hearing from you anytime soon.

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: We urge you to aggregate your potential.
body:
Dear Gordon Richard,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the unresolved fund. I appreciate your diligence in reminding me about this matter. I understand that there may have been some issues with the payout process, and I'm interested in learning more about how to resolve it.

Could you please provide me with more details about the fund? Specifically, I would like to know how much money is involved and what steps need to be taken to ensure a smooth payout. Additionally, if there are any fees or taxes associated with the process, I would appreciate knowing the exact amounts and how they will be deducted.

Regarding my receiving bank, could you clarify why this information is needed? Is it solely for the purpose of processing the payment? I want to make sure that my personal information remains secure throughout this process.

Lastly, I'm intrigued by your mention of the CSR focusing on victims of landslides globally. Could you provide more information about this initiative? It's always heartening to see organizations making a positive impact on society.

I look forward to hearing from you soon and finding a resolution to this matter.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: For your plan.
body:
Dear Ma,



*Your precise mail has been thoughtfully perused and the content noted.* *We
have made elaborate explanations on the reason for finding us in the midst
of this payment via our first meeting with beneficiaries whom we were able
to reach directly and sent letters for an invitational chat while others
communicated via their proxies.  *



*Candidly NOTE that money is next important to mankind after life therefore
while dealing on it, adequate care must be taken in other not to pay to the
wrong hand which you basically know will dispute our credibility and the
apportioning of blames.*



We are yet to ascertain of being in contact with the fit and proper fund
owner whom we intended communicating having not furnished us your
coordinates as listed in our last mail to enable verification in our data
hub which establishes your legitimacy and as soon as this is ascertained,
we shall furnish you all the details you may deem. Our avowal to treat your
personal details with the* highest degree of confidentiality remains
inviolable. Your banking coordinates as required is purely for the
processing and the domiciling of your disbursement in view of our modus of
payment remaining bank to bank transaction.*



*Please know that we pride in our work and hold ourselves accountable to
our word and to the highest standard of performance thus know that our
goals are achieved through mutual co-operation, a strong sense of
integrity, a positive attitude and teamwork therefore hold us to this in
any way and whenever we default or recant thus receive our assurances as we
have repeatedly maintained our guard as a respected institution.*



*Your disbursal value remains US$24.1M including accrued interest, *



*Greeting *

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: For your plan.
body:
Dear Gordon Richard,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate the information you have provided so far. It is important to be cautious when dealing with financial matters, as you mentioned. I understand the need for proper verification and ensuring that the funds are handled correctly.

Could you please clarify what you mean by "fit and proper fund owner"? How do you determine if someone is eligible to receive the funds?

Also, could you explain a bit more about the process of processing and domiciling the funds? How long does it usually take, and what are the necessary steps involved?

I want to ensure that everything is done correctly and securely, so any additional details you can provide would be helpful.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: We must avoid this pitfall
body:
Dear Ma,

Your succinct mail has been assimilated with greater understanding; we
cherish your questions as it will only eliminate unforeseen gray areas that
might constitute clog in the wheel of this payout actuation. However ma,
please understand that we have work rules thus would appreciate your not
setting the cart before the horse.

As an international financial syndication agency involved in large ticket
transactions, Our corporate policy remains limited to disbursements of
funds via bank to bank only therefore our request which we echo again is
that you furnish us your receiving bank coordinates, your direct phone,
your address and a copy of your identification to enable us perform our
statutory obligation to you as estimated.

Our mail of 20th November, 2023 was never sent to the wrong person as they
are officially verified however, we remain duty bound to ensure that
recipient on the other side was the intended person by the submission of
these needs for proper record and to make assurances double sure.

This disbursement is so sacred, central, unique, crucial, critical and
preeminent to us, thus we must do everything in strict compliance to
safeguard its interest and protect its conclusion. The quest to know the
processes would be availed you with ease as soon as first things are done
first to protect your interest and ours too knowing that divulging such
classified information to unintended recipient might warrant jeopardizing
this  entire colossal sum.

We must avoid this pitfall if our goal is very clear.

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: We must avoid this pitfall
body:
Dear Gordon Richard,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your willingness to address my questions and concerns regarding the payout actuation. I understand that you have work rules in place, and I apologize if I seemed to jump ahead without proper information.

I completely agree with your corporate policy of conducting transactions via bank to bank only. It ensures a secure and reliable process. In order to proceed, I would be happy to provide you with the necessary details.

Could you please clarify what specific information you require from me? Are you asking for my receiving bank's name and account number, my direct phone number, my address, and a copy of my identification? I want to make sure that I provide all the necessary information accurately.

Additionally, could you explain further why it is important for me to submit these details for proper record-keeping? I want to ensure that everything is done correctly and in compliance with your policies.

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: We wait on you.
body:
Dear Ma,

Gratitude for your understanding concerning due diligence as it is far
better to avoid any activity that could pinch the skin in consideration to
the sum at stake.

The details in need are

Your Name, address, phone number and any means of identification.

Name of bank

Bank Address

Account No.

Sort code

BIC.                       [if any]

IBAN

Account name

The above details would be used to apply for and process your payment
approvals at the relevant consenting agencies as the records must show
clearly where this fund originated, which is the European Central Bank,
Frankfurt, Germany under the consent of the European Credit Commission to
its designated account being your bank..



Copies of these approvals would be available to you as soon as their
readiness is certain for your record.



We wait on you.



GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: We wait on you.
body:
Dear Gordon Richard,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that everything is done correctly and legally. However, before I proceed, I have a few questions regarding the process.

1. Could you please explain to me how the European Central Bank is involved in this transaction? I would like to understand their role and why they are transferring funds to my bank account.

2. Are there any fees or charges associated with this transaction? If so, could you please provide me with a breakdown of these costs?

3. Can you clarify which agencies will be involved in approving and processing my payment? It would be helpful to know more about their roles and responsibilities.

4. Is there a specific timeline for when these approvals will be obtained? I would like to have an idea of when I can expect to receive the copies of these approvals.

I look forward to your response and gaining a better understanding of this process. Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Not until then, no further detailing.
body:
Dear Ma,

Without descending into the arena of conflict, we have remained categorical
on our modus which no fund owner could change because we remain the
consenting authority and bears the brunt in the event of any untoward
happenstance.

We have stated it as it is on our procedure in other not to compromise the
security or sanctity of this fund and our status therefore our candid
advice is that as soon as the veracity of your standing with the commission
is authenticated, be guaranteed that you will find in us a willing partner
in the actuation of your disbursement with every ease knowing that every of
your questions cum worries would be given steam.

Not until then, no further detailing but remain informed that every
approved payment has a Validity Processing Period of 10 banking days [Two
weeks] in concurrence to the E.U. policy of operating zero tolerance on
idle fund, also, the European Central Bank remains the sole payment outlet
for all the E.U. financial endeavors.

Be guided.

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: Not until then, no further detailing.
body:
Dear Gordon Richard,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your willingness to provide information and guidance regarding the fund. I understand that you have certain procedures in place to ensure the security and sanctity of the funds.

Could you please clarify what you mean by "veracity of my standing with the commission"? What steps do I need to take to guarantee this veracity?

Additionally, could you explain more about the Validity Processing Period? How does it work and why is there a two-week period for processing payments?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: In simple terms.
body:
Dear Ma,



We thank you again; please NOTE that what we mean by “veracity of my
standing with the commission" in simple terms means that the commission
being in contact with the right person we intended to communicate having
detailed to you the requisites needed from you to ascertain proper
confirmation.



The Validity Processing Period starts upon the processing and approval of
disbursement, thus you are given two weeks to complete the remittance of
your funds after approval and not before.

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: In simple terms.
body:
Dear Gordon Richard,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your explanation regarding the veracity of your standing with the commission. It's important to ensure that we are in contact with the right person for a smooth process.

Could you please provide more information about the requisites needed from me? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly before proceeding. Additionally, could you clarify what you mean by the Validity Processing Period? How does it affect the remittance of funds?

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: It is our candid wish that this meets your expectation.
body:
Dear Ma,



The Validity Processing Period means the time frame within which to affect
the remittance of your fund after Due Process has been completed because we
do not tolerate idle funds after requisite approvals has been granted for
its payout.

The details in need are:

Your Name, address, phone number and any means of identification.

Name of bank

Bank Address

Account No.

Sort code

BIC.                       [if any]

IBAN

Account name

It is our candid wish that this meets your expectation.

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: It is our candid wish that this meets your expectation.
body:
Dear Gordon Richard,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your explanation about the Validity Processing Period. It's good to know that there is a specific timeframe for remitting funds after Due Process has been completed.

However, before I proceed further, could you please provide me with more information about the process and the purpose of this remittance? I would like to understand how it works and what steps are involved.

Also, could you clarify which bank you represent and where it is located? It would be helpful to have these details before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: We are to direct you and not otherwise.
body:
Dear Ma,

Having NOT sufficiently proved to be the proper fund owner we intend
communicating, please NOTE that we have ceased further response to your
questions.

We are to direct you as the consenting authority and not otherwise.
Thanks

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: We are to direct you and not otherwise.
body:
Dear GORDON RICHARD,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your response, but I'm a bit confused about the nature of your message. Could you please provide more information about the fund ownership and what exactly you are directing me as the consenting authority for? I would like to understand better before proceeding.

Looking forward to your clarification.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Recognized that no horse gets anywhere until harnessed;
body:
Dear Ma,

Having digested your mail, we reiterate that there is nothing to be
confused for. We have only made common request about due diligence to be
assured of dealing with the rightful person we mean to contact.

In view of the sensitive nature associated with fund disbursement, it
remains our common concern to guarantee each other some measure of comfort
being the reason we have responded to some of your insightful questions but
have to draw the cotton until we are reasonably assured of being with the
fit and proper person we intended.

We understand your worries therefore in other to put your weary mind at
ease, send us your means of identification, your address and your phone
number only while your bank coordinates comes later as these would be used
to facilitate confirmation on your status and upon your affirmation, we
shall give you answers to your questions especially on the procedures to be
taken in the approval processing leading to remittance conclusion.

This level playing field is to ease any unforeseen logjam that might tend
to create hitch while saving time mailing each other every now and then on
what ought to be as it does NOT conjure pleasant circumstances knowing what
is right to do and not doing it but expecting pleasant results.

Remove these veils of uncertainty and hesitation by flying straight with us
unless you are not too sure of yourself or not knowing what you want on
this payout.

Recognized that no horse gets anywhere until harnessed; no life ever grows
great until it is focused, we urge you to objectify this conclusion if you
are desirous of this payout.

Greeting

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: Recognized that no horse gets anywhere until harnessed;
body:
Dear Gordon Richard,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your understanding of my concerns and the need for due diligence. However, before I provide any personal information, I would like to know more about the nature of this payout and the procedures involved.

Could you please explain in more detail how this process works? What is the source of the funds? Are there any legal or financial requirements that need to be met? And what role does the European Credit Commission play in all of this?

I apologize for my cautious approach, but it's important for me to have a clear understanding before proceeding further. Thank you for your patience.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: For your thoughtful perusal and plan.
body:
Dear Ma,

I think it is nice that both of us grasp the auditor’s report and their
mandate on us in other to have a fair view of why this fund is being
credited to the end beneficiary which obviously remains in your name.



A very stringent measure taken by EU Governing Council is that all funds
traceable or originating from outside the Euro zone must be subjected to
critical scrutiny in other to shield the zone from being heaven to illicit
activities and money laundering ranging from proceeds from arms sales, hard
drugs or human trafficking etc.



It is in concurrence to this policy that the EU Audit Board uncovered this
fund floating probably originating from outside Europe but designated in
your name hence the mandate on us to effectuate payment as designated
having been in our purview subject to our diligent investigation in
conformity to the mandates and bye laws of the European Union.



The steam from this synopsis was the reason for the commission’s initial
contact to you based on the healthy disclosures from the banks we have
investigated and believed to have been in legitimate transaction much as
all government taxes are to be deducted from source in line with
international best practices but the fund owner caters for his private
bills as stringently stipulated by the E.U disbursement and financial acts
put together.



Our role is purely supervisory ensuring complete syndication compliance to
allotted funds



Recall that in the time past, many fund owners have accused the commission
of arbitrary deductions from their deemed amount warranting  the  Governing
Board to mandate strictly that all deductions thenceforth must be vetted by
court  and this has remained a subsisting order.



In the light of this premise, your representative attorney is required to
file, process and obtain an enabling tax deduction profile vetted by a
court of competent jurisdiction here and thus submit to us this duly
certified true copy granting us the leave to deduct the stated amount from
your outstanding benefit and credit your balance to run away from
apportioning of blames or act incline to disputing our credibility. These
Documents must however, be certified as true reflection of the original
copies in line with the provisions of the law guiding admissibility of
documents. It is therefore on this instance we can only accept a certified
court order in the deduction of government taxes, this is what we yield and
seek.



You can send your attorney or retain the services of one among the
accredited law firms registered with the bank and the commission to
undertake these assignments as you would have under the supervision of our
Claims & Legal Services Dept. vested with the right of oversight functions
on them. The law firm is to Process, obtain and submit the requisite order
enabling us to carry out our duties and remit your final balance as due.
You will be paying for their services being not the responsibility of the
commission neither government tax.

These are just the two cost incidences on this disbursement, the commission
does not negotiate attorney’s fee on behalf of fund owners but fund owners
are guided by the Claims & legal Services Dept. to preventing these law
firms from taking undue advantage of fund owners.

Your file is moved to the bank to observe and enforce these accurate Tax
assessment deduction plan. You representative attorney is invited to sign
out all the classified payment warrants i.e. The *AUTHORITY TO REMIT,
CERTIFICATE OF INDEMNITY* and most importantly, your *FUND ORIGIN
CERTIFICATE* which states clearly the purpose of payment and enables you
move your fund to any part of the globe you wish to invest having been
cleared of any financial infraction harboring no encumbrance.

The attorney is to supervise and confirm the remittance of your fund into
your bank having paid the statutory *SIGNING FEE *mandatory to every fund
owner at the bank marking the conclusion of your disbursement.

Sorry this might be lengthy compressing all your questions but we only have
to explain this by illuminating the scenarios for you to understand the
facts and sequence of events here as we thus seek your honest counsel in
other to objectify this payout expeditiously.



Greeting



GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: For your thoughtful perusal and plan.
body:
Dear Gordon Richard,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this detailed explanation. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring compliance with the EU regulations regarding fund transfers.

I understand that the EU Audit Board has identified a fund in my name, which requires certain procedures to be followed before it can be credited to me. It is reassuring to know that the commission is taking stringent measures to prevent illicit activities and money laundering.

You mentioned that I need to engage an attorney who will handle the necessary paperwork and obtain a tax deduction profile vetted by the court. Could you please provide more information on how I can find an accredited law firm registered with the bank and the commission? Also, could you clarify what costs I would be responsible for in engaging their services?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the classified payment warrants and their purpose. How do they ensure the secure remittance of funds into my bank account? And what is the statutory signing fee that needs to be paid?

Thank you once again for your explanation, and I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: It is our candid wish that this email suits you.
body:
Dear Ma,

My sincere apologies for this late response owing to my being out of office
on official assignment, I am just reading your mail thus the need to
respond immediately noting that we strive to react with the shortest
possible waiting time appreciating your patience.

In answer to your request, the commission and the bank has full list of
accredited law firms registered with them with proven guarantors thus upon
the request of any fund owner, they are liaised with one amongst them to
carry out all the specified functions as you would have under the
supervision of our Claims & Legal Services Dept. Further more, their fees
are subject to negotiation between the fund owner and the law firm and not
fixed [depending on the extent of work] but our Claims & Legal Services
Dept.regulate arbitrary charges knowing that the fund owner reserves the
right to look for another law firm to objectify the purpose in the event of
not finding a playing field.

The classified payment warrants remain the enabling documents propelling
the remittance. These are the documents you sign in a bank to make
transfers thus they remain classified.

The statutory SIGNING FEE remains US$10.500 only payable at the
commencement of fund processing as the receipt evidencing this payment is a
pre-requisite plus a notarized mandate letter from the fund owner to the
law firm before clearance would be granted to the law firm to carry out
their assignment.

It is our candid wish that this email suits you.

Once again, we appreciate your patience in the know that it is also
important to meet successfully the challenge of time

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: It is our candid wish that this email suits you.
body:
Dear Gordon Richard,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your explanation regarding the accredited law firms and their fees. It's good to know that the fees are not fixed and can be negotiated between the fund owner and the law firm based on the extent of work required.

Could you please provide more information about the classified payment warrants? How do they work exactly, and what is their purpose in making transfers?

Also, you mentioned a statutory signing fee. Could you clarify what this fee is for and why it is necessary?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: There is no ambiguity.
body:
Dear Ma,

There is no ambiguity here as the classified payment warrants are the
normal documents raised by the bank which would be filled and signed by the
fund owner or his attorney detailing where the fund would be wired to. It
is the normal banking transactions carried out in banks or what you may
simply termed as the wire instructions.

This applies to your* AUTHORITY TO REMIT, CERTIFICATE OF INDEMNITY* and
most importantly, your *FUND ORIGIN CERTIFICATE *which details the origin
and purpose of payment. While the Authority to remit is retained by the
bank, the *CERTIFICATE OF INDEMNITY* and *FUND ORIGIN CERTIFICATE *are
issued to the fund owners to cover their funds to any destination they may
wish to invest.

The SIGNING FEE is a mandatory payment on all fund owners before the
signing out of the fund payable at the bank as an administrative cost.

Sincerely,

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: There is no ambiguity.
body:
Dear Gordon Richard,

Thank you for providing me with this information. I appreciate your explanation about the classified payment warrants and how they are filled and signed by the fund owner or their attorney. It's interesting to learn about the normal banking procedures involved in wire transfers.

Could you please clarify what you mean by "AUTHORITY TO REMIT" and "OF INDEMNITY"? How do these documents relate to the fund owners and their funds? Also, I'm curious to know more about the purpose of the FUND ORIGIN document. How does it help in covering the funds for any investments?

Regarding the SIGNING FEE, could you explain why it is mandatory for all fund owners? What does this fee cover, and why is it payable at the bank as a cost?

Thank you for taking the time to provide me with these details. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Weigh this on the scale of common reasoning.
body:
Dear Ma,

I humbly believe that we have provided you with enough insight which was
never our modus thus to rigmarole or move in circles is not one of our
marks.

To our satisfaction all the questions you have asked have been attended to
candidly thus we expect that you do the needful in the event you wish to
have this payout objectified. You must know that good intentions are
certainly not enough in achieving potential goals as good intentions with
bad approach would not yield the desired goal.

We have done our bit thus the onus lies on you to succeed, we therefore ask
you to act well your part for there your honor lies. Do this effectively,
significantly and relevantly and your crown would be too significant to be
ignored.

Despite holding your firm views, our advice to beneficiaries has always
been dispassionate, even-handed as we have never hid unpleasant facts in
the best traditions of public service.

Weigh this on the scale of common reasoning.

Greeting

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: Weigh this on the scale of common reasoning.
body:
Dear Gordon Richard,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate the insight you have provided so far. I understand that good intentions alone may not be enough to achieve goals, and I am willing to do my part to succeed.

Could you please provide more details about the payout you mentioned? How does it work and what steps do I need to take in order to receive it?

I also wanted to ask about the European Credit Commission. Could you tell me more about your organization and its role in this process?

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: All you have asked has been answered
body:
Dear Ma,

Having proven not to be readily available to stimulate all these efforts,
we inform you that it is time to turn off the curve to avoid exposing this
disbursement further.

All you have asked has been answered but perhaps you choose to walk in
vicious circles.

We remain here in the event you still need us in giving meaningful
reasoning to your disbursement by your prove to be the fund owner whom we
intended to communicate with.

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: All you have asked has been answered
body:
Dear Gordon Richard,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize if it seemed like I was not readily available before. I assure you that I am interested in the information you have to share. Could you please provide more details about what this "curve" is that needs to be turned off? I want to make sure I understand the situation fully.

Additionally, I appreciate your willingness to answer my questions. However, there may have been some miscommunication as I don't recall receiving any answers from you yet. Could you kindly reiterate the information or clarify which questions you are referring to?

I look forward to hearing back from you and continuing our conversation.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: We have stated the chapter and verse on the origin of this fund
body:
Dear Ma,

Mailing you repeatedly on what ought to be done and not doing it but
expecting pleasant results amounts to time waste and shooting the breeze.

We have stated the chapter and verse on the origin of this fund in our
previous emails unless you are not too sure of yourself and your
transaction in which case we shall be obliged to ask you to disqualify us
from every representation henceforth in any ramification in which you seek
of us.

But if you have found in us to be of a veritable reputation qualified to
retain your instructions and to take all necessary actions within the ambit
of the rules of our engagement, be guaranteed that you will find in us a
willing partner as you pro-actively take advantage of the emerging
dispensation in the actuation of your payment.



Furnish us the need to ascertain whom we are dealing with.



Be guided



GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: We have stated the chapter and verse on the origin of this fund
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out with this information. I appreciate your detailed explanation. Could you please provide more specifics about the fund's origin and how it relates to me? I want to ensure that I have a clear understanding of the situation before proceeding further.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: It is time we make a no claim submission
body:
Dear Ma,

From the look of things, it appears we are not in communication with the
right fund owner whom the auditors have listed to us. Sincerely, it is
puzzling suggesting that you knew nothing about the aforesaid fund already
in your name.



The element of truth and fact which is a requirement for a perfect
financial record has evidently manifested here as it has been recorded that
this fund represents your full payment.



All relevant government authorities has endorsed payment of this fund in
your name waiting for it to be processed out, the facts here also clearly
show that this expenditure has been captured in this first quarter
financial year for appropriation in your favor therefore your conduct is
absolutely amazing.



The reason for finding us in this disbursement remains purely supervisory
ensuring complete disbursement compliance to allotted funds to their owners
as recommended by the Auditors.



I think is time we make a no claim submission to the Auditors likening this
fund to have been abandoned as unclaimed while your file would be regarded
as treated and closed.


Pleasant day,



GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: It is time we make a no claim submission
body:
Hello Gordon Richard,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's interesting to hear about the fund that is apparently in my name. Can you provide more details about how this fund came to be recorded under my name? I want to make sure I understand the situation clearly before taking any further steps.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Time is not luxury.
body:
Dear Ma,

The irony of life is that we are the one chasing you around to come for
your money almost as if we are extracting honey from the rocks but when you
eventually receive this fund, you will hardly remember that we exist.

The summery of our mails is that we have been on this issue of your
disbursement for a while without any tangible headway to show for all these
efforts.

Be that as it may, we shall only do our bits but the onus lies on you to
succeed if you act well your part for there your honor lies, thus do this
effectively, significantly and relevantly and your crown would be too
significant to be ignored.

Please create the level playing field needed in achieving this payout
without hitch by availing us where you wished this fund to be remitted
including your direct phone for convenient communication at the time of
remittance plus a copy of your identification for us to be sure of dealing
with the fit and proper fund owner, this is just what we seek from you.

Bearing in mind that our actions must confirm with the dictates of the
royal floor seamlessly knowing that the E.U. operates zero tolerance on
idle funds, could you please avoid the apportioning of blames kindly.

Believing that all is well at your end and that your worries are few, we
wish you a pleasant day in view to read from you earnestly.

Time is not luxury.

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: Time is not luxury.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out with this information. I appreciate your efforts in trying to assist with the fund transfer. Could you please provide more details on how I can proceed to ensure a smooth remittance of the funds? 

Looking forward to your guidance on the next steps.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: For your info.
body:
Dear Ma,

Your mail received, Please NOTE that upon our receipt of the requisites, we
shall use the account details to make application for disbursement
approvals to the consenting authorities.

Upon granting of the application, you would be required to file a Court
Certified Tax Deduction profile which states your exact tax obligation to
the government and would then be deducted at source in line with
international best practices.

Your attorney will now proceed to the bank to sign out your funds after the
payment of the SIGNING FEE and then supervise and confirm the conclusion of
your remittance with your bank marking the closing of your file.

This is where your direct phone line becomes handy as the remitting bank
will be communicating with you and your bank until final confirmation of
fund in your account is ascertained.

Greeting

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: For your info.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your update on the process involved in obtaining approvals and filing the Court Certified Tax Deduction profile. Could you please provide more details about the signing fee and how it is determined? Additionally, I would like to understand the timeline for the entire remittance process once the signing fee is paid.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Greeting
body:
Dear ma,

The SIGNING FEE is an administrative charge to every disbursal being
syndicated by the commission. It does not vary nor being determined by the
amount being syndicated, it is fixed.

The remittance process starts from the commencement of payment application
to the approving authorities but upon granting of consent to the
application, the fund owner is given two weeks to process out and complete
the disbursement of his fund into his account in strict abidance to the
E.U. policy on zero tolerance on idle funds.

Greeting

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: Greeting
body:
Hello,

Thank you for sharing this information about the signing fee and the remittance process. Could you please provide more details on how one can proceed with the payment of the signing fee and what steps are involved in completing the fund transfer into the account?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: There is no ambiguity in the payment of the SIGNING FEE
body:
Dear ma,

There is no ambiguity in the payment of the SIGNING FEE as the
representative attorney usually oversees that being that most of the law
firms receive that from their clients [Fund owners] or the fund owner can
pay that directly into the details provided by the Claims & Legal Services
Dept.

As we have stated, as soon as your payment application is granted, your
attorney is invited having undergone clearance with the Claims & Legal
Services Dept. and the Audit Board which requires him to present the
receipt evidencing the payment of the SIGNING FEE and a notarized mandate
letter from the fund owner affirming the retention of his services to file
the tax papers and the requisite deductions carried out and then sign the
remittance documents. The fund is directly credited into your account
through the necessary routes to your bank and the lawyer makes the
confirmation that you have received knowing that the bank has deployed
their requisite monitoring mechanism ensuring confirmation. It is a banking
norm that has been deployed effectively and has remained in practice.

Hope this meets you well.

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: There is no ambiguity in the payment of the SIGNING FEE
body:
Hello Gordon Richard,

Thank you for sharing this information about the signing fee process. Could you please provide more details on how the attorney oversees the payment and what steps are involved in ensuring the funds are credited directly into the account? I want to make sure I understand the process clearly.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Your payment status
body:
Dear Ma,

Please know that before the attorney gets involved with this payment he
must have regularized his status with the commission as he is first and
foremost expected to confirm your details with the commission by way of
preliminary findings..

He then takes up his assignment by supersing the application already made
by the commission requesting for approval for its payout while at the same
time processing the Tax Deduction papers in court .

As we have stated, as soon as your payment application is granted, your
attorney is invited having undergone clearance with the Claims & Legal
Services Dept. and the Audit Board which requires him to present the
receipt evidencing the payment of the SIGNING FEE and a notarized mandate
letter from the fund owner affirming the retention of his services to file
the tax papers and the requisite deductions carried out.

He then signs out the remittance documents at the bank as the fund is
directly credited into your account by our bank through the necessary
routes to your bank.  The lawyer confirms that you have received knowledge
that the bank has deployed their requisite monitoring mechanism thus
receives an answer back from your bank confirming that the fund has been
domiciled into the recipient’s bank account. It has remained a banking norm
that has been deployed efficiently having served the purpose of
confirmation..

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: Your payment status
body:
Hello Ma,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like there are several steps involved in the payment process. Could you explain a bit more about how the attorney verifies the details with the commission and what role the Tax Deduction papers play in this process? I'm curious to learn more about how everything comes together for the payout.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: a common ground
body:
Dear Ma,

It remains a common ground that your detailed information furnished us
would be provided to the law firm upon your retaining their services
therefore that is expected of them to run a detailed confirmation on these
coordinates.

The tax deduction papers as the name implies is self explanatory. This is a
court certified Tax Deduction Profile assessed on your payment. This means
that you are not paying tax in advance but deducted from your principal
claim.

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: a common ground
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. Can you tell me more about how the tax deduction process works in this case? I'm curious to learn more about it.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: we have attended to every question that needed to be asked satisfactorily
body:
Dear Ma,

It appears we still have a long way to go repeating and answering
questions, we have attended to every question that needed to be asked
satisfactorily thus would rather not move in circles.

We are here in the event you still need us in giving meaning to this
disbursement.
Thanks

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: we have attended to every question that needed to be asked satisfactorily
body:
Hello Gordon Richard,

Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your willingness to provide information. Can you please elaborate on how the European Credit Commission can assist in giving meaning to the situation at hand?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Pleasant weekend
body:
Dear Ma,

Having failed to provide us your details in other to process out this fund
for payment, we take it that you have already made up your mind for
forfeiture of fund thus we shall return a no-claim submission to the
Auditors.

This fund is assumed to have been abandoned or unclaimed while your file
would be regarded as treated and finally closed.

Pleasant weekend

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: Pleasant weekend
body:
Hello Gordon Richard,
Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize for not providing my details earlier. Could you please provide more information about the fund and the process for claiming it? I want to make sure everything is in order before proceeding. Have a great weekend!

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Thanks for your questions anyway.
body:
Dear Ma,

If you are truly desirous of this fund, this is the third time you are
asking this same question and we have dutifully answered you.

Thanks for your questions anyway.

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: Thanks for your questions anyway.
body:
Hello,

I appreciate your response. I just want to make sure I fully understand the process. Could you please clarify how the fund transfer will be initiated? Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Mary

Dear Ma,

How the fund transfer would be initiated has been answered you previously,
the process is in your mail box.

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re:
body:
Hello Gordon Richard,
Thank you for providing information on how the fund transfer process will be initiated. I will check my mailbox for further details. Can you please confirm the next steps after I receive the email?
Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: This situates your quest.
body:
Dear Ma,

In Answer to your last question, our correspondence of 20th February 2024
[3 DAYS AGO] situates your quest.

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: The next step
body:
Dear Ma,

The next step is for you to provide us your coordinates in order that we
commence the processing of your payout.

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: This situates your quest.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your message. Can you please provide more details about the information regarding February that you mentioned? I would like to learn more about it.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: The next step
body:
Hello Gordon Richard,
Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the payout process. Can you please provide me with more details on how to proceed?

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Receive our thanks
body:
Dear Ma,

Receive our thanks for helping us out in resolving your disbursement timely
by directing us to retire it to the treasury as abandoned and unclaimed.

Greeting

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: Receive our thanks
body:
Hello Gordon Richard,
Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the information you provided about retiring the funds to the treasury. Can you please share more details about the process of resolving this matter? I would like to understand it better. Thank you.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Receive our thanks
body:
Hello Gordon Richard,
Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the information you provided about retiring the funds to the treasury. Can you please share more details about the process of resolving this matter? I would like to understand it better.
Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Receive our thanks
body:
Hello Gordon Richard,
Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding retiring the funds to the treasury. Can you please share more details about the process of resolving this matter? I would like to understand how it works. Thank you.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Receive our thanks
body:
Hello Gordon Richard,
Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your efforts in resolving the issue and directing me on what to do next. Can you please provide more details on how to retire it to the treasury as abandoned and unclaimed? I want to make sure I follow the correct procedure. Thank you.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: The process
body:
Dear Ma,

We have said it before as we repeat that the process starts with you
providing us with your receiving coordinates where you wish this fund be
paid into knowing that a bank account is to receive this fund.

Upon our receipt of the aforesaid we shall use these details to make an
application for approval of disbursement to consenting authorities. Upon
the approval of our application, your attorney is invited to sign out your
payment release documents at the bank having to submit your tax deduction
plan for the deduction of your tax obligation to the government and the
payment of your SIGNING FEE. He will then supervise the conclusion of your
remittance and confirm from you that the money has been received by your
bank.

GORDON RICHARD

European Credit Commission

subject: Re: The process
body:
Hello,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. Can you please provide more details about the process and how it works? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Receive our thanks
body:
Hello Gordon Richard,
Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your assistance in resolving this matter. Could you please provide more details on how to proceed with retiring it to the treasury as abandoned and unclaimed? I would like to ensure everything is handled correctly.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Receive our thanks
body:
Hello Gordon Richard,
Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your assistance in resolving this matter. Could you please provide more details on how to retire the funds to the treasury as abandoned and unclaimed? I would like to understand the process better. Thank you.

Best wishes,
Mary
